comments.content:
(這首歌與歌詞是倆人重逢關鍵)

《Hello stranger》

Shoo-bop, shoo-bop, my baby
Shoo-bop, shoo-bop

Hello stranger
It seems so good to see you back again
How long has it been?

Seems like a mighty long time
Shoo-bop, shoo-bop, my baby
It seems like a mighty long time

Ahhh my my my my I'm so glad
You stopped by to say hello to me
Remember, ah that's the way it used to be

It seems like a mighty long time
Shoo-bop, shoo-bop, my baby
It seems like a mighty long time

Shoo-bop, shoo-bop, my baby
Shoo-bop, shoo-bop

Ohh, yes I'm so glad
You're here again

If you're not gonna stay
Please don't tease me like you did before
Because I still love you so although

It seems like a mightly long time
Shoo-bop, shoo-bop, my baby
It seems like a mighty long time

Ohh, ohh my, my, my, my, I'm so happy
That you're here

urls.description: Classic Oldie from Barbara Lewis. Thanks for all the views on this great song. Be sure to check out
urls.title: Hello Stranger - Barbara Lewis

comments.content: 這部片算同志電影啊？我喜歡阿磺對賽隆說了：你在什麼時間點要怎樣的人生是由自己決定的，而不是別人來支配你，所以他做自己一直愛凱文這樣嗎？（亂入😅

first.content:
這部從頭到尾就是不折不扣的同志電影哦:)
可以再看第二遍確認ㄧ下啊~
但我相信你應該不會想花這麼久的時間再看第二遍XD
first.name: Anson

first.content: 不會啊，看過就知道要下一秒要演什米，我從不重複看，不懂的你會在這裏詳細解說，謝謝你們⋯有好幾個很會寫，不唱名了Thanks
first.name: Queen🐝📝我的生活❤️

comments.content: 同志片，歌舞片  今年奧斯卡真冷

first.content:
哈~還好啦，有藝術片也有商業片，只是兩部票房相差很多是不爭的事實。
看完的時候，覺得製作水準還是不錯，所以也有預測在影片、導演、男配、改編可能得獎，最終除了導演沒得，該得的也得了。
first.name: Anson
